Package com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham

Class Room

java.lang.Object
com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham.MapSite
com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnchantedRoom
public class Room extends MapSite
Abstract product class Represents a room in the maze. Each room has four sides that can be either a wall or a door.

  • Method Details

    • setSide

      public void setSide(Direction direction, MapSite site)
      Sets one of the sides of the room to the specified MapSite.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction of the side of the room being set (North, South, East, West).
      site - The MapSite element to modify a side in a certain direction
